org.mapdb

Class Volume.LoggerVolume

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapdb.Volume
      • org.mapdb.Volume.LoggerVolume
  • Enclosing class:
    Volume

    public static class Volume.LoggerVolume
extends Volume
    Logs write operations performed on Volume. Useful for debugging storage problems.
